title: wtf crashes: no module mutagen

labels.name: fix-implemented
labels.description: A fix is available, but has not been merged or released, yet.

body:
`enh-metadata` branch
```
(dev) [yoh@rolando test]$ datalad plugin wtf
[WARNING] Metadata query results might be incomplete, initial metadata aggregation was not yet performed in 1 dataset at: ['/mnt/DICOM/test']
[ERROR  ] No module named mutagen [audio.py:<module>:17] (ImportError)
```
```
  File "/home/yoh/datalad/datalad/interface/utils.py", line 382, in generator_func
    result_renderer, result_xfm, _result_filter, **_kwargs):
  File "/home/yoh/datalad/datalad/interface/utils.py", line 449, in _process_results
    for res in results:
  File "/home/yoh/datalad/datalad/metadata/metadata.py", line 995, in __call__
    **res_kwargs):
  File "/home/yoh/datalad/datalad/metadata/metadata.py", line 359, in _query_aggregated_metadata
    cache, merge_mode):
  File "/home/yoh/datalad/datalad/metadata/metadata.py", line 403, in _query_aggregated_metadata_singlepath
    content_meta=False)
  File "/home/yoh/datalad/datalad/metadata/metadata.py", line 582, in _get_metadata
    from . import parsers
  File "/home/yoh/datalad/datalad/metadata/parsers/__init__.py", line 17, in <module>
    from . import audio
  File "/home/yoh/datalad/datalad/metadata/parsers/audio.py", line 17, in <module>
    from mutagen import File as audiofile
```
